content.new:
Gazebo 7.0.0.

When we send a `reset_world` message to Gazebo, we set the seed to a fixed value.  

On two separate runs, given the same actions, we see exactly the same result in Gazebo.  That is, our model joint positions are completely identical.

issue.title: Camera Noise Does Not Obey Global Seed
